ygData.subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: Atually I ll probably use that a lot on my troll shaman ( currently level 21 ) because his intell is so low. It s just a pain hitting the skill over and over.
ygData.messageBody:
Atually I'll probably use that a lot on my troll shaman ( currently level
21 ) because his intell is so low. It's just a pain hitting the skill over
and over.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, February 18, 2000 11:51 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?


>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>>wouldn't bother complaining about it though, or they'd probably replace
>>it with a new find true north song. Then they'd probably fill in the
>>missing songs with find true east, find true west and find true south.
>
>Note that the spell they replaced with True North, Sense Magic, is a
>lvl 1, MAYBE lvl 4/5 spell. It did NOTHING before. Now, if you are
>young, it will be a useful spell. Sure, you don't want it if you are
>now lvl 49 (except to train that skill perhaps) But how many
>people still use Flame Lick at lvl 49 either?
>
>I think Verant really did improve Sense Magic, for the levels that
>spell is put in at. I work to max Sense Heading first thing when I
>create a new character. 1) it takes forever. Only in lvl 8, when
>I had to travel across the continent and used SEnse Heading every
>time it came up, did my bard FINALLY max Sense Heading. And even
>maxxed, its not very consistent yet. At levels 1-4, your MAX
>Sense heading, after all, is 10-25... And sometimes it can be useful to
>know. Just because you stay in your newbie area at that time does not mean
>that everyone is.
>
>Sarah Heacock sarah@...
>Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
>Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
>Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
>Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
>(Blackburrow)
